name: The Van Game Demo
description:
Wishlist and Download on Steam! Join the Discord!

The Van Game is a retro style road-trip around the USA, inspired by the classic "Oregon Trail". Discover over a dozen national parks the way they're meant to be seen, in glorious pixel-art!  Dozens of Choose-Your-Own-Adventure encounters with police, Crazy Karens, and fellow travelers. Play 7 different mini-games and manage your resources to stay on the road. Contract over 12 diseases and try to keep your crew happy!

This is the demo version of the game, I'm still working out some bugs. You have four days in-game to go as far as possible. The Van Game will be in the Steam Next Fest in October. Release date is scheduled for October 11th, 2022 for $5.

The game still has a few small bugs, please let me know if you encounter any. You can leave your bug reports in the comments at the bottom of this page. Thank you for playing!
